title: Azure AI Engineer Associate (AI-102)
subtitle: Design and Implement Azure AI Solutions
description: Build, manage, and deploy AI solutions using Azure Cognitive Services, Azure AI Search, and Azure OpenAI
overview: This advanced course prepares you to design and implement AI solutions on Microsoft Azure. You'll learn to build intelligent applications using Azure Cognitive Services, implement knowledge mining with Azure AI Search, and create generative AI solutions with Azure OpenAI Service. Perfect for developers ready to integrate AI into real-world applications.

instructor.name: Yair Knijn
instructor.title: Principal Cloud Architect & Engineer

personalStory.story: Azure AI has transformed how we build intelligent applications. I've helped teams implement everything from document processing pipelines to sophisticated RAG systems with Azure OpenAI. The combination of Azure's AI services with proper architecture patterns enables solutions that seemed like science fiction just a few years ago. This course gives you the practical skills to build these solutions in your organization.
